description:
RICHARD M. ROTHMAN is the Founder & MD of OpenMind Opportunity Consultancy Pvt. Ltd., the world’s first and only opportunity consultancy, based in Mumbai. He is one of the world’s leading experts on Business Opportunities. 

Richard’s clients have included famous Indian brands such as Zee TV, Onida, Metro Shoes, Hiranandani Group, Stardust Magazine, Officer’s Choice Whiskey, Aptech, K. Raheja Constructions, and Asian Heart Institute. Prior to starting his consultancy, Richard  served as Trade Commissioner of the United States of America in Italy, Indonesia, and India. 

Over a span of 32 years, Richard has expanded business opportunities for hundreds of companies operating in 67 sectors. His experience spans 41 countries on four continents.
